mil3.3.12:2.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, nagaraguttiko majjhe nagarasiṅghāṭake nisinno passeyya puratthimadisato purisaṁ āgacchantaṁ, passeyya dakkhiṇadisato purisaṁ āgacchantaṁ, passeyya pacchimadisato purisaṁ āgacchantaṁ, passeyya uttaradisato purisaṁ āgacchantaṁ;
mil3.3.12:2.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yañca puriso cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, taṁ viññāṇena vijānāti.
mil3.3.12:2.4: Yañca sotena saddaṁ suṇāti, taṁ viññāṇena vijānāti.
mil3.3.12:2.5: Yañca ghānena gandhaṁ ghāyati, taṁ viññāṇena vijānāti.
mil3.3.12:2.6: Yañca jivhāya rasaṁ sāyati, taṁ viññāṇena vijānāti.
mil3.3.12:2.7: Yañca kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṁ phusati, taṁ viññāṇena vijānāti, yañca manasā dhammaṁ vijānāti, taṁ viññāṇena vijānāti.
